location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: A rough sketch of the sections of Shaikh Ahmad's estate in Fao

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Rough plan attached to a letter no. C-173 dated 29th April 1938 (folio 214) showing the relative positions of the sections of the Shaikh of Kuwait estate in Fao with occupantsâ€™ names reported; the proposed cut new road and widened old roads indicated by pecked line.Oriented with west to the top.
